name: Sarenrae's Blessing
description: The surface of this mystical shield is warm to the touch and grows hotter when tensions rise.
benefit: Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Enemies within close take 1 point of fire damage per round.

name: Irori's Devotion
description: A large blue crystal surrounded by hardened steel forms a remarkable shield.
benefit: Physical damage is reduced by 1 point.
additional: When struck by a critical, you and your allies within near heal 1d6 hit points.

name: Black Sanctuary
description: A heavy dark iron shield reinforced with magical runes grants the wielder exraordinary protection.
benefit: Elemental damage is reduced by 1 point.
additional: You can cast Mirror Image once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Outworn Shield
description: This simple wooden shield far from ordinary, the shield is in fact thousands of years old.
benefit: When wielded by a Priest or Ranger the shield grants +1 to all saving throws.

name: Redfield
description: This battered shield saw use in one of the bloodiest battles of the The Shining Crusade. Despite this the shield retains its vibrant crimson hue.
benefit: Physical damage is reduced by 3 points.

name: Scâth Gwannek
description: The Scâth Gwannek, or "Winter Shield", once belonged to a dwarf lord during the Quest for Sky and was thought to be lost.
benefit: Cold damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Melee weapons deal an additional 1d4 cold damage.
